name: Conspicuous Cognito
description:
Conspicuous Cognito is an experimental game that subverts the stealth genre. Cognito, the player character, aims to be the centre of attention and become famous through robbery. The player must explore levels and strategize the best way to steal items - whilst being noticed.

This game was created during my time at university and in a group of 4 other students. My role in the group was to program all of the gameplay elements and to assist with UI programming.
